doc.title: Excuse My French!
doc.plot: English celebrities 'Esther Rantzen' (qv), 'Marcus Brigstocke' (qv) and 'Ron Atkinson (II)' (qv) spend four weeks in France learning the French language through immersion, assisted by their teachers and a series of tasks. Esther begins with a reasonable fluency in French, Marcus begins with a basic knowledge, and Ron knows no French at all. The ultimate goal is to carry out a task related to their own profession; Esther must interview a politician on a French talk show, Marcus must perform a stand-up comedy routine in French, and Ron must provide an analysis of a soccer match on French radio.
